subject: Gymnastics
Coaches and Managers
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Sex Crimes
Child Abuse and Neglect
lead_paragraph: Don Peters, a former Olympic gymnastics coach accused of sexually abusing two athletes in the 1980s, was barred for life by USA Gymnastics and his place in the federation’s Hall of Fame was revoked.
snippet: Don Peters, a former Olympic gymnastics coach accused of sexually abusing two athletes in the 1980s, was barred for life by USA Gymnastics and his place in the federation’s Hall of Fame was revoked.
